communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

According to the The HIDTA/NCRIC, the agency will maintain a log/audit trail of requested, accessed, searched, or disseminated facial comparison analysis information. The information pertaining to facial comparison analysis requests will consist of the following details: Date,Name of Personnel Accessing the Facial Recognition System,Case Number,Requestor Name, Title, Agency, Email, Phone,Facial Comparison System Used,Results (Positive/Negative),Dissemination (Who, What, Where, When, How?),Notes (Enhancements used?)

I am seeking:

1. The current database schema, data dictionary, or other reference document(s) to how the agency keeps track of facial recognition/comparison queries
2. A log/audit trail of all facial recognition or comparison searches run by the agency since 01-01-2018.  The data should contain these and any other relevant fields:
Date,Name of Personnel Accessing the Facial Recognition System,Case Number,Requestor Name, Title, Agency, Email, Phone,Facial Comparison System Used,Results (Positive/Negative),Dissemination (Who, What, Where, When, How?),Notes (Enhancements used?)

As required under the law, I request that the agency provide the above records in their native digital format, where applicable (such as a CSV, Excel, or other digital data format), and transferred to me electronically.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Dhruv Mehrotra

title: Second admenment for requested time information. (Mclennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Tuesday November 28th, 2023

I am NOT requesting any specific dates, or specific time, information. I am requesting just the NUMBER of DAYS per week spent at each location listed and for each employee listed for the date ranges listed below.

McLennan County can obtain and provide this information from the following: Magnetic Swipe logs for, Thomas Parnell McNamara, Chris Eubank, Rebecca Eubank, and Cody Blossman for 901 Washington, 

Hwy 6 Jail and Jack Harwell Detention Center Sign In Logs for, Thomas Parnell McNamara, Chris Eubank, Rebecca Eubank, and Cody Blossman for 901 Washington, Hwy 6 Jail and Jack Harwell Detention Center again just the number of days.

and any other record-keeping methods of physical presence or time spent at 901 Washington or Hwy 6 Jail and Jack Harwell Detention Center

during each weekly period for the following yearly periods.
January the 1st 2013 until December 31st, 2013
January the 1st 2014 until December 31st, 2014
January the 1st 2015 until December 31st, 2015
January the 1st 2016 until December 31st, 2016
January the 1st 2017 until December 31st, 2017
January the 1st 2018 until December 31st, 2018
January the 1st 2019 until December 31st, 2019, to include the takeover of the Jack Harwell Detention Center in September 2019
January the 1st 2020 until December 31st, 2020
January the 1st 2021 until December 31st, 2021
January the 1st 2022 until December 31st, 2022
January the 1st 2023 until November 28th, 2023

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.
Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,
Bernadette Feazell

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell
